MY RATING: ★★★★★★★★★☆ 9/10

Portal was one of the first PC games i got into as a child. Although the experience is short, it is still worth playing through at least once. The problem solving in each level, the mechanics and the environment are so well done and continues to stay one of my favorite games of all time.
It Portal

Игра прекрасная, до этого я слышал от других что это просто техно-демка, не более. Но мне эта игра принесла удовольствие, интересные головоломки, интересный сюжет. Занять 2-3 часика перед НГ 2021 самое оно, как раз что я и сделал. Игра учит свободе и любовью к жизни и это в ней очень сильно зацепляет!

Beaten base game 11.26.2020, Beaten the Advanced Chambers [12.26.2020]

Portal is a very fun and short experience. It is the first game that I have beaten from my desktop. The visuals still look good today & the gameplay still works today. The Advanced Chambers was a bit of a challenge but nice extra content with more puzzles to do. I do see myself playing this game again in the future.
great
It was a short playthrough, but extremely well made and fun.

One of the best games of all time. Valve let this series die like everything else they own. Play this and portal 2, but don't expect and satisfying ending. Although the story will end eventually, there is no satistying lore ending given in 1 or 2, but the games are funny as hell, clever, and fun.

Portal is a short but sweet break from Valve's typical first person shooters, set in a puzzle-like environment, with your only ability being a portal gun, which already sounds fun on its own. Although I got sometimes stuck in a few places, the game never failed to impressed me with every new room that I entered. This is definetly a game that I would replay, and is definetly worth your money.
